description: Dana DeArmond once again show why we consider one of the toughest bondage models out there. Hogtied was Dana's first shoot in the adult business some two and a half years ago. For most models as time passes their interest in doing hard bondage tends to wane, but not Dana. She just loves it and gets better every year. Breath play, tickling, severe bondage, suspensions, hard orgasms and the most weight we ever put on a crotch rope. Dana takes it all and wants more.
title: Dana DeArmond, is still one of toughest bondage models of our lifetimes.
